ygData.subject: Stats on reinforced or studded leather
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone have these stats?  I have been looking for these items, but it seems tht no one makes them!  I would love to see the stats and determine if my
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone have these stats? I have been looking for these items,
but it seems tht no one makes them! I would love to see the stats
and determine if my search is worth while. I would be willing
to discard my quite common banded armor in favor of this if the
AC were not too much lower, just for the sake of RP'ing...





Drew Simonis wrote:
>
> From: Drew Simonis <Care227@...>
>
> > I could be wrong, it just might be a place that no one has been too, or
> > bragged about. But these places I'm sure are few and far between, if they
> > even still exist.
>
> Kera Isle is full of MOB's that like to train, an no one to help out.
> The best loot I got there in 2 days of hunting Pridesman, Clawknights
> Kera Guards and Huntress's were some gem stones. Mostly I got fish.
>
> I did meet up with some fellow travelers, and, as we were the only
> people in the zone, we got great exp, which is what I need anyway.
>
> Winvaras <last name pending>
>
